item.title: Commission bias
item.description: Mental model collection The Practice of Groundedness (Loc 1240) Humans suffer from what behavioural scientists call the commission bias, or the tendency to err on the side of action over inaction.

item.title: It's not what you know, it's who you know
item.description: Mental model collection [[C_Likability]] [[B_The Magic of Thinking Big]] [[B_Barking Up the Wrong Tree]] Do circulate in new groups. Restricting your social environment to the same small group produces boredom, dullness, dissatisfaction; equally important, remember that your success-building program requires that you become an expert in understanding people.
